channel.title: C++ on Dangling Pointers
channel.description: Recent content in C++ on Dangling Pointers

item.title: Don’t use std::list
item.description: I feel like I’ve been saying this a lot lately ‒ at least once per intern we take at Pastagames ‒ so I guess it’s time I write it down. There’s nothing new here, this has been said a hundred times over on the Internet, but since a lot of people are still not aware of it, here is my contribution.
